content: Investments ETF DBS Vickers Securities Asked by AnonymousAsked on 11 Apr 2019I have my savings in POSB, invest STI ETF with DBS & I plan investing inS&P 500 with DBS Vickers. If DBS goes kapoot, does it mean all my investment,savings will be at risk?Should I consider investing with other brokerage firms to divesify?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

BSBernard SohLevel 1. FreshieUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Yes for your STI ETF.For your S&P500, depends on your vickers account, custodian or CDP, you might lose it all.However, if DBS really goes kapoot, I believe you will have a much bigger problem to face.1 comment0
